Nightlight::

Nightlight almost answered to the new comer when ROdimus's voice made 
her turn her face towards the Maximal Leader.

"Hi, my love"said sweethy the femme "How was the meeting?"
She sudden remmembered the new comer and looking towards the bot 
while she slowly took Rodimus' hand "Hi, who're you?"

She was courious about the new comer.
